com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao

Interface DataAccessObject<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of model being stored.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataAccessObjectImpl

    public interface DataAccessObject<T>
    The DataAccessObject (DAO) interface defines the behaviour for all DAO within the system. This will serve to provide an abstract interface to the database. This will provide specific data operations without exposing details of the database. This interface has been designed to allow JPA IoC through the use of JPA-specific abstract implementations.

    • Method Detail

      • addEntity

        DataResponse addEntity(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> values)
        Add an entity to the persistent storage. The values provided will be used to build the entity. The value structure will consist of a map of all values to be stored. Any child entities will have their keys stored as a Map (this will be passed on to the child entity persistence manager).
        Parameters:
        values - The values that make up the entities key.
        Returns:
        The DataResponse that contains the response to the operation.

      • deleteEntity

        DataResponse deleteEntity(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> keyValues)
        Delete an entity to the persistent storage.
        Parameters:
        keyValues - The values that make up the entities unique key. That model will be deleted.
        Returns:
        The DataResponse that contains the response to the operation.

      • updateEntity

        DataResponse updateEntity(T updatedEntity)
        Update the given entity in the persistent storage.
        Parameters:
        updatedEntity - The entity to update in persistent storage.
        Returns:
        The DataResponse that contains the response to the operation.

      • getAllEntities

        java.util.List<T> getAllEntities()
        Get a list of all entities that are stored within the persistent storage.
        Returns:
        A List of all users.

      • getAllEntities

        java.util.List<T> getAllEntities(int pageNumber,
                                 int pageSize)
        Get a list of all entities that are stored within the persistent storage.
        Returns:
        A List of all users.

      • getEntity

        T getEntity(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> keyValues)
        Get a specific entity T based on the key values that have been passed in.
        Parameters:
        keyValues - The key values to search on.
        Returns:
        The entity T from persistent storage.

      • findEntities

        java.util.List<T> findEntities(Query query)
        Find a list of entities based on a given query.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to find entities on.
        Returns:
        A List of the entities that were found.

      • findEntities

        java.util.List<T> findEntities(Query query,
                               int pageNumber,
                               int pageSize)
        Find a list of entities based on a given query.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to find entities on.
        pageNumber - The number of the page that you wish to retrieve.
        pageSize - The size of the page that you wish to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A List of the entities that were found.
